Key Match Events: Tyrese Haliburton scored 33 points and had 15 assists without a turnover
Pascal Siakam posted 18 points and 11 rebounds
Kelâ€™el Ware contributed a career-best 25 points on 9-of-11 shooting and added three blocks in 21 minutes off the bench for the Heat
Bam Adebayo finished with 20 points and eight rebounds
Terry Rozier had 16 points and seven assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: Indiana Pacers were untroubled from the outset
The Pacers shot 7-of-15 from deep and attacked the paint with precision
The Heat coughed up 41 third points in the third quarter
Others: Jimmy Butler started with a layup in the opening seconds, but that was his only score of the first half
It was also the only time Miami had the lead
Adebayo and Herro stemmed some of the bleeding for the Heat in the second
Rookies Ware and Keshad Johnson piloted a spirited 11-1 run, helping the Heat close the gap to 12 midway through the fourth
